name: City Crushers
description:
This is a tiny mini game made for the #gbjam4.

"The year is 2027.
Earth population reaches maximum.
Skycrapers are built every day.
Governments call upon the help of Robot demolition specialists.

They are The City Crushers.

A mini game made by :
Joonas Turner (incredible blips and blops)
Laurent Victorino (silly code)
Thomas Noppers (amazing art)
